title: [A Touch of Zrenigotham Elegance]
[Akono's Weaponry]
description: Muraled wooden walls rise from a glossy mahogany floor.  Just above some puffed raw silk pillows hangs a trio-bladed mounted vellum fan, and a mosaic tiled ceiling completes the picture.  A white marble shelf and a beveled glass-covered case stand side by side in the middle of the room.

Enclosed by muraled wooden walls, the shop features some puffed raw silk pillows in the center of its mahogany floor.  A trio-bladed mounted vellum fan hangs under the tiled ceiling.  Right near the front is a beveled glass-covered case and a white marble shelf.
